name: Senior C++ (retrain Java)  Developer (to Montenegro)
description:
Our vacancy implies relocation to Montenegro!

We are looking for Senior C++ Developer interesting in retraining to Java for our new office KOFAX Montenegro for the distributed teams.

Required skills and experience:

  • Excellent Knowledge of C/C++
  • Familiarity with concepts of memory management, usage of pointers
  • Experience in working with SQL databases (non-SQL database experience is a plus)
  • Experience in working with Cloud platforms, such as Azure or AWS
  • Experience in working with Docker is a plus
  • Familiarity with Linux is a plus
  • Some front-end experience (HTML, CSS and JavaScript) is a plus
  • Good debugging skills
  • English requirements: fluent reading and writing, moderate to no spoken
  • Applying for our position please attach examples of your works (you can link to github) or you will need to complete a test task.

We offer:

  • Work for an international software company that provides competitive products and services of high demand for over 35 years;
  • Relocation package when moving to Montenegro: a residence permit, assistance in adaptation;
  • The office is located in the capital of the country, the city of Podgorica;
  • Flexible schedule and Home-office work structure;
  • Professional and career growth;
  • Well-established and well-organized software development process;
  • Training and learning opportunities according to individual needs.

Additional benefits:

  • Residence permit for family members;
  • 100% paid sick leave (regardless of work experience);
  • We are a strong community, a team working together cohesively, sharing our thoughts, experience and creative ideas.
